item.title: On My Record Collection
item.description: It is a Saturday afternoon. I am sitting at home, doing work with a freshly brewed pot of tea. There’s a crate of vinyl records next to the couch, and slowly I am working my way through them. I own

item.title: On voicing issues which aren't yours
item.description: “Fly away, little shit-bird,” a voice on Twitter said, before the voice stopped following me. “Fly away…”
